title: Champs and Skins gone
body:
I signed into my PBE today (first day of 6.1 on PBE), and all of my champs and skins are gone. When I go to *owned* it says I own nothing. I'm not sure what happened or what I should do.

 I still have a good amount of IP and RP left, but it seems silly that I should have to take the time to buy all the skins again  and spend more of the rp when I have already spent it...

replies.body: As others have mentioned, this was intentionally done to help with testing of the new features - Crafting and the Loot System.

Okay... here's what you should do. **First,** go to the **PBE Community** boards page. Then, go to where you see a "!" icon at the top right corner... click on it. The second thing listed should explain everything. **Please tell this to anyone else confused.**

------------------------------------------------

If you want to get back champions during this time, go to the shop menu, stay on the **Featured** page, and scroll down. There should be 3 items listed; you can either buy chests and keys separate for just 1 IP each, or get them together for 100 IP each, I'd recommend the first suggestion. Now continue buying these until you get 3 champ shards. Combine them to get back a champ and use him/her/it to test and play. That's the only way to get champs right now, I got about 8 or 9 right now. It may take about 30+ chests and keys to get the champs though, its not easy.
They had reset them so people could test the crafting system for unlocking, I believe.
Ah~ That makes sense! Thanks guys :]
